solution_line_template: {weeks_of_school} weeks of school x {sandwich_days_per_week} days of the week = <<{weeks_of_school}*{sandwich_days_per_week}={total_sandwich_days}>>{total_sandwich_days} days of school
{wednesdays_missed} Wednesday + {fridays_missed} Fridays = <<{wednesdays_missed}+{fridays_missed}={total_days_missed}>>{total_days_missed} days of school missed

{total_sandwich_days} days of school – {total_days_missed} days of school missed = <<{total_sandwich_days}-{total_days_missed}={sandwiches_eaten}>>{sandwiches_eaten} peanut butter and jelly sandwiches eaten
